page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The main kind of job in this area was the{textile industry.} They made {carpet cloth}and did a lot of {spinning.}When they were open there were lots of jobs, but they closed and people became{unemployed.} They{closed}because people were bringing things from{abroad}which were a lot{cheaper.}New jobs were hard to find and lots of people were unemployed. {Dewsbury}has{high unemployment.} It is higher than the{national average . The only jobs around come from small businesses which are growing up around the district. People are going to{job {centres}and looking through the{local {papers.}The job centre has lots of jobs but most people cannot find one for themselves. The local papers advertise work but the{wages}are small,not enough to live on.
